notes.text: sap.m.ObjectStatus: ontap event is marked as handled
sap.m.TimePicker: Make TimePickerMaskMode.Enforce public
sap.m.MessageItem: correct show more focus outline
sap.m.Tokenizer: The aria-labelledby attribute is now correctly set
sap.m.MultiInput: Token addition is now reset on focusin
sap.m.DynamicDateRange: popup is resized when there are less
sap.m.SearchField: Revert - Prevented unnecessary reopening of suggestions
P13nPopup: Filter with error state
sap.m.Link: Press event is fired correctly on pressing SPACE
sap.m.MultiComboBox: After deletion next focused token is announced with correct position
sap.m.FacetFilter: adjust facet popover autoclose behavior
sap.m.ComboBox: clearIcon width distortion is now fixed
sap.m.Toolbar: Preserve arrow key behavior for sap.m.MultiComboBox
sap.m.MultiComboBox: Resetting initial value state is now fixed
sap.m.MessageStrip: apply CSS classes correctly
sap.m.Tokenizer: tokenizer is no more focusable in disabled state
sap.m.MultiComboBox: change event is now fired correctly
We've now fixed an issue where the slide tile content was not adjusting dynamically to the screen size
We now display placeholder text while renaming a file on the UploadSetItem
sap.m Tokenizer: Ensure role "listbox" is applied to the correct container
VariantManagement: Readjust order of destruction and creation of role contexts
sap.m.MenuButton: open menu with correct button combination
sap.m.VariantManagement: Improve save dialog
sap.m.Tokenizer: align mobile dialog cancel button placement
sap.m.DynamicDateRange: improve grouping announcements for screen readers
sap.m.Link: enable context menu on iOS long press
sap.m.ObjectStatus: Remove deprecated API usage
sap.m.Tokenizer: fix border color and background for token displayOnly and non-editable state
sap.m.SearchField: Prevented unnecessary reopening of suggestions
